DOC.brief_summary: Poor oral motor development preterm neonate common . Feeding problem lead long hospital stay high hospital cost . Different intervention show efficacy accelerate transition move faster full oral feed autonomy . Our study aim evaluate impact 2-year education nurse program feeding pattern hospital stay preterm neonate . This interrupted time series study place Intensive Care Neonatal unit university hospital locate Lyon , France . All preterm neonate include study , April 2013 January 2016 .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Oral Feeding Educational Nurse Program Feeding Performance Preterm Neonates
DOC.criteria: Preterm neonates less 34 week ' gestation Preterm neonates require surgery endotracheal intubation Preterm neonates hospitalize Neonatology Neonatal Intensive Care Unit university hospital , Lyon .
